biotools.summary: BYASE is a Python package that uses Bayesian inference to identify gene-level and isoform-level ASE (Allele-specific expression) in polyploid (diploid or higher) organisms from single-end or paired-end RNA-seq data.

bioschemas.name: BYASE
bioschemas.summary: BYASE is a Python package that uses Bayesian inference to identify gene-level and isoform-level ASE (Allele-specific expression) in polyploid (diploid or higher) organisms from single-end or paired-end RNA-seq data.
